meanings.definition: To change the image or perception of a product or company.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to rebrand its logo to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: They plan to rebrand their products to appeal to a younger audience.
meanings.sent3: After the rebrand, the product looked like a whole new creation!
meanings.sent4: The rebranding of the company breathed fresh life into its sales.
meanings.sent5: The rebranding process was like giving the product a makeover.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a new identity or image to a product or company.
meanings.sent1: The successful rebrand of the company led to increased sales.
meanings.sent2: The rebrand of the product was well-received by the market.
meanings.sent3: The rebrand of the company made it stand out among competitors.
meanings.sent4: The rebranding effort transformed the company's public image.
meanings.sent5: The rebrand gave the product a fresh and modern look.
